name: Space Tank Golf
description:
Blast off into space, with this retro-themed arcade game! Grab your gunner, your air supply and get ready to shoot your way to victory! Compete to be the best artillery operator, in the galaxy!

Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Xbox compatible controller OR Mouse and Keyboard
  • Internet connection (for score saving and leader boards)

Features:

  • Global scoring system
    • Simple new user registration
  • 3 Courses to compete with your friends on!
  • Interface fade on detection of tank in overlapped area
  • 2d and 3d objects to create a more in-depth feel

Credits:

  • Programming/Development/Concept created by Haddicus Games, LLC
  • Much of the graphic artwork created by Kenney.NL
  • Audio/sound files owned by Haddicus Games, LLC, some files used under CC0
